title: Drawing, "Godfrey de Bouillon, after Giulio Romano and Raphael Sanzio", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on laid paper
markings: Watermark: bottom part of lily in double oval
inscribed: Inscribed in ink, inside the bracket over Godfrey: VENVI/ XCVI
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Godfrey de Bouillon, after Giulio Romano and Raphael Sanzio", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2078.
